CharTemp.summary: Struct that holds a simplified version of the Character class

Character.summary: The Character class. Stores information for the character

CID.summary: Gets or sets the ID Property
CID.value: Int: Unique identifier for the character

Fname.summary: Gets or sets the Fname Property
Fname.value: String: First name of the character

Lname.summary: Gets or sets the Lname Property
Lname.value: String: Last name of the character

DNA.summary: Gets or sets the DNA Property

Gender.summary: Gets or sets the Gender Property

BirthTime.summary: Gets or sets the birthtime Property

DueDate.summary: Gets or sets the Duedate Property
DueDate.value: Double: In-simulation date when pregnancy ends

SpouseID.summary: Gets or sets the SpouseID Property
SpouseID.value: Int: Identifier reference for another character
SpouseID.remarks: Holds the identifier for the characters spouse

Dead.summary: Gets or sets the Dead boolean Property

Racee.summary: Gets or sets the Race property
Racee.value: Race: Object that contains Race information

Strength.value: Int: Gets the average of the DNA values that represent this attribute

Intelligence.value: Int: Gets the average of the DNA values that represent this attribute

Dexterity.value: Int: Gets the average of the DNA values that represent this attribute

Constitution.value: Int: Gets the average of the DNA values that represent this attribute

Wisdom.value: Int: Gets the average of the DNA values that represent this attribute

Luck.value: Int: Gets the average of the DNA values that represent this attribute

Charisma.value: Int: Gets the average of the DNA values that represent this attribute

Height.value: Int: Gets the height value from the DNA information and from the race object

HairColor.summary: Gets the hair color from the DNA information
HairColor.value: String: Name of the hair color

EyeColor.summary: Gets the eye color from the DNA information
EyeColor.value: String: Name of the eye color

SkinColor.summary: Gets the skin color from the DNA information
SkinColor.value: String: Name of the skin color

CharTempC1.summary: Constructor for the CharTemp Struct. Sets all of the values
CharTempC1.param: Double: Time when pregnancy comes to fruition

CharTempC2.summary: Constructor for the CharTemp Struct. Sets values based on an existion character

CharacterC1.param: Double: Birth time in numeric form
Double: Due date in numeric form

CharacterC2.summary: Constructor to intilize a new character from DNA
CharacterC2.param: Double: Current time in numeric form

CharacterC3.summary: Constructor to create new character from parents

CharacterC4.summary: Constructor to create a character from the struct

GetProperty.summary: Gets the property from the Race database
GetProperty.param: Int: Integer value for the first gene that is held by the DNA
Int: Integer value for the second gene that is held by the DNA
List: The list of property strings

GetMod.summary: Gets The modifier value from the attribute score
GetMod.param: Int: The value of the attribute

IsPregnent1.summary: Checks to see if the current character is pregnent

IsPregennt2.summary: Checks to see if a Character is pregnent

ToString.summary: The Tostring method for this class

CharacterDB.summary: The Child class for Database that conects to the character table. Also has specific functions for use with characters

FamTree.summary: Gets or sets the FamTree property

CharacterDBC.summary: Creates a database object that is specific to the character table
CharacterDBC.param: Database: Database object that holds the character table

GetCharacter.summary: Gets a character from the table with an id
GetCharacter.param: Int: Unique identifier for the character to be found
GetCharacter.returns: Character: Character object that matches the identifier
GetCharacter.remarks: This function already exists in the parent class - To Be Deprecated

Query.summary: Private method to run a query
Query.returns: List: List of characters that meet the query specifications
Query.remarks: I'm thinking about refactoring this function into a few different functions so I can get more specific information from the database

GetAllCharacters.summary: Gets all of the character objects in the table

FillListWithViableCharacters.summary: Gets all of the characters that the life simulator requires
FillListWithViableCharacters.param: GTime: Current time of the simulator

SaveCharacter.summary: Saves a character object into the table

SaveListOfCharacters.summary: Uses the SaveCharacter function to save a list of characters
SaveListOfCharacters.param: List: List of characters to be saved into the table

InsertCharacter.summary: Inserts a new character into the table
InsertCharacter.param: Character: Character object to be inserted

UpdateCharacter.summary: Updates an existing character in the table
UpdateCharacter.param: Character: Character object to be updated

GetNumberOfAliveCHaracters.summary: Gets the number of characters in the table that are alive
GetNumberOfAliveCHaracters.returns: Int: number of characters that are alive

GetNumberOfDeadCharacters.summary: Gets the number of characters in the table that are dead
GetNumberOfDeadCharacters.returns: Int: number of characters that are dead

GetNumberOfSingleCharacters.summary: Gets the number of characters in the table that are single
GetNumberOfSingleCharacters.returns: Int: number of characters that are single

NumOfRowsInTable.summary: Returns the number of characters in the table
NumOfRowsInTable.returns: Int: Number of characters in the table
NumOfRowsInTable.remarks: This is an overridden function from the parent Database class

InTable.summary: Gets a character from the table with an id
InTable.param: Int: Unique identifier for the character to be found
InTable.returns: Character: Character object that matches the identifier
InTable.remarks: overridden function from the parent Database class

CodonStatic.summary: Static class that contains lookup information for the genes
CodonStatic.remarks: A Gene consists of 3 , it is an encoded value

TranslateCodon.summary: Translates a codon into its respective value
TranslateCodon.param: Int: codon value to be translated

ToList.summary: This method returns the allele in the form of a list
ToList.returns: Returns a list of the alleles in their positions
